div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Tag: All (Details: DSF Read Access Tag code ALL = 'All')
This case-sensitive code system http://dsf.dev/fhir/CodeSystem/process-authorization defines the following codes in a Grouped By hierarchy:

tr.td: Process authorization for a local organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-organization

Process authorization for local users with a specific practitioner role in an organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-organization-practitioner
Process authorization for a remote organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-organization
Process authorization for a local parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role

Process authorization for local users with a specific practitioner role in a parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role-practitioner
Process authorization for a remote parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role
Process authorization for all local organizations
Process authorization for all local users with a specific practitioner role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-practitioner
Process authorization for all remote organizations

definition.value: Process authorization for a local organization specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-organization

Process authorization for a local parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role

Process authorization for local users with a specific practitioner role in a parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role-practitioner
Process authorization for a remote parent organization member with a role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-parent-organization-role
Process authorization for all local organizations
Process authorization for all local users with a specific practitioner role specified via extension http://dsf.dev/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension-process-authorization-practitioner
Process authorization for all remote organizations
